root.description: GameplayAPOX is a real-time strategy game that includes gameplay concepts from FPS games, wherein the soldiers in the game can perform varied tasks such as:prone and crouch in order to avoid getting hit or to better prepare a shotswitch active weaponsthrow grenadesloot corpses for ammo, etcshare ammo with their squad-mates (soldiers will have limited ammo)be placed in vehicles, allowing the player to create their own unit designsDespite all this, APOX still plays very much like a Real-Time Strategy game, and managing your structures and resources is still key to achieve victory over your opponents.System RequirementsOS: Windows XP/Vista/7Processor: 2GHz Processor or higherRAM Memory: 1GB or moreGraphics Card: DX9c compatible GPU, Pixel Shader 2.0 or higherDirectXÂ®: DX9cHard Drive Space: 2GBSound Card: DX9c compatible
